snippet.title: Lever Simulator - Multiplayer: Trailer
snippet.description:
The game is now published on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2866700/Lever_Simulator__Multiplayer/

Patreon: https://patreon.com/AtlanticHenry

In this game, you'll use two computer mice to play in three different multiplayer game modes (more game modes will be added in future updates). With one mouse for each hand, you'll interact with levers to manipulate diverse machinery while competing against your friends.
Currently, the game has the following game modes:

Mecha Robot Race: Race against your friends with Mecha Robots;

Long Ranged Artillery: Choose a spot to place your Artillery Machine. Find the other players' spots and bombard them;

Harpoon Arena: Control Mobile Balistas to pickup randomly spawning harpoons and shoot your opponents.

Next update will involve a game mode for flying planes...
